name: Starjunk DSSR
description:
You will engage hostage or refugee rescue operations, reclaim ships or installations occupied by raiders, mutineers, pirates or alien organisms, and other government-sponsored missions.

Your expertise is combat and elimination, but also maintenance, salvage, infiltration and rescue. You will have to manipulate your environment to your advantage, but also maintain it to guarantee your survival and success.

Because, in space, the environment and even your own technology can turn out to be as deadly and hostile as any space pirate or parasitic xenoform.

This game's development is currently on hold due to Wave Engine having turned their Beta paradigm upside down and left me hanging with a very complex project with 300+ uncompilable errors.

However it is fully playable and fully moddable, it only has a very complicated GUI due to well, being a very complex game, and lacks some polish.

I am planning to port the entire game to Unity in the near future. If you like where this is going, you can support the attempt by buying the game here!
